snippet: The electric automaker lost $75 million in the third quarter, less than what analysts had predicted.
abstract: Tesla Motors reports net losses of $75 million for third quarter, nearly twice as much as previous year, on revenue of $852 million; nonetheless, earnings were better than expected, helping to raise company's stock.
lead_paragraph: The electric automaker lost $75 million in the third quarter, less than what analysts had predicted.

headline.main: Tesla Reports Loss, but Beats Wall Street Expectations
headline.print_headline: Tesla Reports Loss, but Beats Wall Street Expectations
